body_html: I have a high level question regarding this feature request: what are the key benefits of a native approach (directly running TF on YARN) compared with a Spark based approach, most notably https://github.com/yahoo/TensorFlowOnSpark?
body_text: I have a high level question regarding this feature request: what are the key benefits of a native approach (directly running TF on YARN) compared with a Spark based approach, most notably https://github.com/yahoo/TensorFlowOnSpark?
body: I have a high level question regarding this feature request: what are the key benefits of a native approach (directly running TF on YARN) compared with a Spark based approach, most notably https://github.com/yahoo/TensorFlowOnSpark?
